thread.section_title: FreshCotton Beoordelingen | Beoordelingen van FreshCotton | www.freshcotton.com
thread.title: Albert Roux

author: Albert Roux
title: Albert Roux
text:
Purchased a few items from them, had a couple to return because they didnÂ´t look the part and sizing was off, which made me question their authenticity.
Exhausted all contact forms ( phone, e-mailed and Whattsapp ) for more than a week and never got a word from them about return procedures or refund.
Finally gave up, contacted Paypal and opened a claim, they were the ones that refunded me via their buyer protection.
